amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part A of House Report 117-420 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 18, 31, 44, 53, 79, 83, 97, 118, 128, 139, 151, and 160.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc No. 1 comprised of amendments numbered 1, 18, 31, 44, 53, 79, 83, 97, 118, 128, 139, 151, and 160, printed in Part A of House Report 117-420.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendments (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 229 (Roll no. 367).

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Ms. DeLauro.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendments (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 199 - 229 (Roll no. 367).
